about: Distinguished graduate with exceptional experience in information science and project management. Solid understanding of software architecture, data analysis, and UX design; offering skills in computer programming and human-computer interactions, I am currently pursuing career opportunities with a dynamic growing company as a developer in the Seattle area or remotely.
template: Example Paragraph: I am passionate about my work. Because I love what I do, I have a steady source of motivation that drives me to do my best. In my last job, this passion led me to challenge myself daily and learn new skills that helped me to do better work. For example, I taught myself how to use Photoshop to improve the quality of our photos and graphics. I soon became the go-to person for any design needs.
